list: Forged and heat-treated head for durability
Fiberglass core and bi-material slip-resistant handle
Rim temper reduces incidence of chipping or palling

reviews.title: "Hammer Time!"
reviews.text: When the glaziers came by to repair and replace all the broken windows and doors in our new property,  they couldn't quite get a stubborn twisted jamb to bend back the right way before they left.  Hammer time!  We ordered a bargain hammer online but when we went to pick it up we found this heavier one for just a dollar more.  It was sturdy, light (we are no marines) high quality, perfect for our simple job and less than ten dollars.  With the right tool we saved the $400 a new door would have cost and now we can use the storm door and let air in without bees coming in too!
reviews.author: Augustine

reviews.title: "A Nails' Nightmare Come True"
reviews.text: Don't let the smooth face fool you.  This hammer is the number one cause of nails to go flush in wood.  You could buy a cheap knock off from some wack-a-mole website that claims to be better but don't be fooled.  Talk to a local nail and he will tell you this hammer hits hard.  I was using this the other day and my wife shouted out "What is going on?" I replied "I'm wacking nails baby!"  I'm dropping nails like Trump is dropping tweets at 3am.  With this hammer it's Hammer-Time-All-The-Time!  Nails are sold separately.
reviews.author: SecretAgentAbe

reviews.title: "Nice Hammer"
reviews.text: This is a nice hammer. Good weight, nice balance. Great for pounding nails, not so good for driving screws. It's a hammer, but it's a NICE hammer.
reviews.author: doug

reviews.title: "Great help"
reviews.text: This hammer is very solid without being too heave for my arthritic fingers, and has the surface that is good in the grip.
reviews.author: Dzimm

reviews.title: "My Favorite Hammer!"
reviews.text: Love the comfort of the handle, it is sleek and does an excellent job!
reviews.author: Betsy

reviews.title: "My Last Hammer!"
reviews.text: I was tired of breaking hammers, this one is built tough and I believe it's my last hammer! And it's blue!!
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Great flooring instal hammer"
reviews.text: I recommend this hammerPossitives- 1.)Feels great and is comfortable 2.)Light enough for extended use without fatigue 3.)Very durable 4.)Good enough for any work except framing 5.)Cheap priceNegitives-1.) I would like the claw to be straighter, I find it hard to do certain tasks when other hammers with straighter claws have worked in the past.I use this hammer everyday and it works great for pounding tack strip nails in for carpet, hit exposed nails not all the way hit in by the framers in the subfloor, driving in 1/4" crown staples in underlayment that where not driven in completely by the stapler without damaging the underlayment to much because of the smooth head, and tapping laminate and engineered hardwood with a tapping block or pull bar.
reviews.author: Teddy

reviews.title: "Very nice hammer."
reviews.text: This hammer is well made and balanced. A good overall hammer that should last a lifetime. The only and perhaps last hammer you will need.
reviews.author: Dano

reviews.title: "Hammer"
reviews.text: Yep, it's a hammer.... I just bought it for casual use; I'm not a contractor.
reviews.author: EdBarltes

reviews.title: "Hammer"
reviews.text: This hammer has good balance, handle is well attached and easy to grip. Good hammer
reviews.author: Toby

reviews.title: "Quality hammer"
reviews.text: This hammer is great for driveing nails and very strong made I bought 1 then used then I went back to lowes and bought another one great hammers well done kobalt
reviews.author: Bubba

reviews.title: "Nice hammer"
reviews.text: Lightweight with a handle that fits nicely in a small hand. Nicely balanced. An overall good hammer
reviews.author: itsme

reviews.title: "Works as advertised"
reviews.text: The Kobalt 16oz hammer is well built and balanced and provides a good option to a 20 oz. hammer
reviews.author: chubking

reviews.title: "love it"
reviews.text: I love this hammer, well balanced, conformable grip, great for hard worker or DIY
reviews.author: doranu77

reviews.title: "Nice Hammer"
reviews.text: Nice hammer. It has a nice weight and feel to it. Good price too!
reviews.author: Carol

reviews.title: "Great Hammer"
reviews.text: Love the weight and feel. Well made. Price was right too.
reviews.author: Brucef111d

reviews.title: "Nice"
reviews.text: Very nice hammer. Did its job. Hope to have long time
reviews.author: Mr4p0

reviews.title: "Nice hammer"
reviews.text: Nice hammer fit nicely in the hand and easy to use
reviews.author: Kyle

reviews.title: "Great Hammer For The Price."
reviews.text: What is there to say about a hammer? Not much really but I will try.I bought this hammer about two years ago to replace a wooded handle one (i hate wooden handle hammers) and to just say I own a Kobalt tool. Well turns out that this is really just a general, run of the mill 16oz hammer. It gets the job done with very little issues. There are no cons I can think of. However, my current work has brought to my attention that a rip claw is needed. So if someone was to ask me curve claw or a rip claw, answer....rip claw.
reviews.author: GMonkey

reviews.title: "Great Tool.."
reviews.text: I bought this item along with a pry bar to pull out nails in my handicapped ramp. That had been holding down anti-skid strips that had been coming off. This hammer was nicely lite and well balanced. It is easy for me to use because don't need alot of swing force.
reviews.author: Paul31968

reviews.title: "Hammer"
reviews.text: This hammer feels great in my hand. As a left handed user this is unusual for me. most hammers have a mold that seems to be slightly uncomfortable to hold with a full grip. Not the case with this hammer.
reviews.author: KCDCJ51

reviews.title: "bought this hammer/loved the grip. of the handle"
reviews.text: i bought this hammer. and just enjoyed the over all feel of the fiber glass and rubber covering.  after using it an several jobs. this has become my favorite hammer !
reviews.author: rumpole

reviews.title: "Comfortable, solid hammer."
reviews.text: This hammer has a great balance and is easy to use.  It's just heavy enough to get the job done without being tiring.  Great price, buy one if you need a hammer.
reviews.author: NeilC

reviews.title: "Good balance of quality and price"
reviews.text: This Kobalt hammer quickly is becoming the go-to hammer for my multiple homeowner projects. Great grip and balance with fine quality of craftsmanship.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "A steal for $4.98"
reviews.text: It's a good hammer. It being $4.98 (on sale) made it a great hammer. I bought 2 for myself and my wife one too.
reviews.author: Brad

reviews.title: "Bought two of these"
reviews.text: Good basic hammer. I also got one for a friend. She will love it!
reviews.author: Missy

reviews.title: "It's a hammer"
reviews.text: It does what hammers do. Works especially well on nails.
reviews.author: ted

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: JoeFixit99

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Rich

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Fox

reviews.title: "Needed a new hammer"
reviews.text: I had been using a hammer owned and used by my grandfather, who passed away in 1974. It was handed down to my father at that point. Well, my father passed in 1998 and it became mine. The wood handle has become loose over the years and the head rocks when in use. Rather than cause further damage, I retired it to a special place on the tool wall and bought this one to use.
reviews.author: Ed

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Fox

reviews.title: "Great hammer"
reviews.text: What can I say, great hammer with very strong handle. Claw easily grabs all nails and makes them easy to remove.
reviews.author: FishingPierRepair

reviews.title: "It's a hammer."
reviews.text: It's a hammer.  It hits things.  It hits 'em good.  Comfortable handle.  Good balance.
reviews.author: Copperhead43

reviews.title: "Great hammer"
reviews.text: Works like it's suppose too. Not too heavy. Good handgrip.
reviews.author: CA

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Pgybnk

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Karuvipural

reviews.title: "Awesome, simple hammer!"
reviews.text: Great hammer with perfect balance for the price! If you can find this one on sale then it's the perfect hammer for regular use on your tool belt, or in the bag-o-tools you keep around the house for just-in-case.
reviews.author: Eric

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Warrior173

reviews.title: "Kobalt hammer"
reviews.text: I do a lot of carpentry work, although it's not my primary job. This hammer feels comfortable in your hand,and it swings true. My only regret is that I didn't by a few more while they were on sale.
reviews.author: Franco

reviews.title: "Hammer Review"
reviews.text: This claw hammer is well constructed and balanced. It has good ergonomics to help minimize user fatigue. Also, the reasonable price for this quality hammer makes it a very good deal.
reviews.author: Dick

reviews.title: "Kobalt 16-oz. Smooth Face Steel Claw Hammer"
reviews.text: Well-balanced tool that is comfortable in the hand. Light enough to decrease fatigue yet heavy enough to get the job done. Construction seems solid.
reviews.author: Fajer

reviews.title: "I was looking specifically for a 20 OZ hammer..."
reviews.text: I like the CLAW TYPE heads ...do not like the straight ones.... I settled on a 16 oz. until i find a 20 oz ,,in this CLAW TYPE HEAD
reviews.author: blackhawk

reviews.title: "Its a Hammer!"
reviews.text: Its a Hammer! Works like a hammer, claw works quality handle and materials. Would buy again.
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "Simple but effective"
reviews.text: Just the right weight.  I like the grip handle, and flat side for pounding in tight areas.
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Solid hammer"
reviews.text: For someone who only needs a hammer to hang stuff on walls this gets the job done
reviews.author: Drose

reviews.title: "Hammer"
reviews.text: Solid hammer that came with 3 different sized nail sets for finishing nails.
reviews.author: Lew

reviews.title: "Great Hammer"
reviews.text: This hammer was just the thing for the remodeling project we are doing.
reviews.author: Packersfan

reviews.text: great value and very good weight bought two 16oz and two 20oz hammers
reviews.author: billy

reviews.title: "16 oz hammer"
reviews.text: Drives nails like a champ. Dropped forged and fiberglass handle.
reviews.author: Dewster

reviews.title: "Great Hammer for the Price"
reviews.text: Very good value.  Seems well constructed.  Sale price was great.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Good deal"
reviews.text: Tough, cheap, and the handle absorbs a good amount of shock.
reviews.author: SCL

reviews.title: "Kobalt claw hammer"
reviews.text: Easy to work with and gets the job done with ease. I love it
reviews.author: Lee

reviews.title: "It's a hammer"
reviews.text: Good weight balance and it does it's job. It's a hammer.
reviews.author: Bronk

reviews.title: "Kobalt hammer great value!"
reviews.text: Excellent hammer comfortable grip & well balanced.
